en.title: FE Launches Quantum Spa & Quantum Water!
en.content:
FE launches two new Quantum Science products, Quantum Spa and Quantum Water, at FE's HQ to a full house audience on 24th September 2008. Both Quantum Spa and Quantum Water contains FE's proprietary scalar energy technology.

At the launch FE's Founder Director KS Lee introduced the two products and did a series of demonstrations to show the power of FE's Quantum Spa and Quantum Water. By simply washing or rinsing one's hands with the water from the Quantum Spa or sipping some water from the Quantum Water, one can immediately improve one's strength, balance and flexibility! Besides the scalar energy, FE's Quantum Spa and Quantum Water also has many other properties in them. (Refer to Products for more info.)

FE would like to thank Presidential Director Bernard Foo for doing a great job as MC for the launch. Thank you also to Presidential Directors KC Phoon and Rachel Thomas who as always are truly inspirational with their speeches!

And to EVERYONE, SEE YOU ALL AT THE TOP!
